content.raw:
We didn't have a version check in runviewer for BLACS, so there is no point bumping BLACS' major version number, which would otherwise have been useful - runviewer before its pull request is now incompatible with BLACS after it with no version check to make the error message helpful.

What about if for backward compatibility we put connections.py back in but just have it import * from labscript_utils.connections?

That way if people update BLACS but not runviewer things will keep working.
